icon - Variable in class base.Man
 
inBounds(int, int) - Method in class map.Board
This method check if the provided coordinates are inside the bounds.
initialize() - Method in class main.graphicLauncher
This method initialize the map with a length of 50x100.
initialize(int) - Method in class main.graphicLauncher
Deprecated.
interactAction(JTextArea, JTextArea, JTextArea) - Method in class main.graphicLauncher
That method search for the actual citizen on the board, then scan up, down, left and right and want for interactions.
interactAll(Board, CitizenList) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This method runs over a CitizenList object and performs a interaction for each of the citizens inside using the interactSpecific() method.
interactBaker(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This method cast the genericMan to a Baker.
interactBlacksmisth(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Blacksmith and if find a Miner inside search for Mined gold in the miner inventory.
interactCarpenter(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This method cast the genericMan to a Carpenter.
InteractController - Class in main
That class controll the interactions between the map and the different Man objects.
InteractController() - Constructor for class main.InteractController
 
interactLumberjackFurniture(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Lumberjack and if find a base.Furniture object inside call the method dismantleFurniture().
interactLumberjackTree(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Lumberjack and if find a base.Tree object inside call the Lumberjack.cutTree() method.
interactMiner(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This metod scan the up, down, left and right coordinates of the Miner and if find a mineral inside call the Miner.crushingMineral() method.
interactSpecific(Board, Man) - Static method in class main.InteractController
This method took one 'genericCitizen' and search for his className.
inventory - Variable in class base.Man
 
Inventory - Class in main
This class store a ObjectsList for different types of objects simulating the inventory of a character.
Inventory() - Constructor for class main.Inventory
This constructor create a new empty ObjectsList.
isName(String, Board, int, int) - Static method in class main.InteractController
Search if on object have the specific name.
isWater(int, int) - Method in class map.Board
This method check if one position on the map have a Water object inside.
